dcterms:creator: N. K. Kaneshiro
et al.
dcterms:description: The NMED-T dataset contains cortical (EEG) and behavioral data collected during natural music listening. EEG signals were recorded from 20 adult participants while listening to a set of 10 full-length songs with electronically produced beats at various tempos. The EEG data were pre-processed to remove artifacts.
dcterms:title: NMED-T dataset
